      • search

        public java.util.Vector<NamedObj> search(java.lang.String classname,
                                         boolean approx)
        Parameters:
        classname - the classname (as a term/keyword) to search for
        approx - if true, find approximate term matches, and if false, do exact matches Searches the ontology matching the term and for matches, finds annotated items. For example, search("RichnessIndex") finds all actors that instantiate either the class named "RichnessIndex" or one of its subclasses.
        Returns:
        Description of the Return Value

      • main

        The main program for the AnnotationEngine class for testing: prints out the annotations.
        Parameters:
        args - The command line arguments
